did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Thomas G. Helfrich Collection of Nuclear Industry and Construction Industry Labor Relations Documentation, 1975-1993
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection reflects the interests of Mr. Helfrich (ILR'64) and projects in which he was involved in throughout his career.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Construction Employers Labor Relations Association of New York State, Inc. (CELRA)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Thomas G. Helfrich Collection of Nuclear Industry and Construction Industry Labor Relations Documentation #6234. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
